title: Static Analysis

android.permission.ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION.description: Access fine location sources, such as the Global Positioning System on the phone, where available. Malicious applications can use this to determine where you are and may consume additional battery power.

android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE.description: Allows an application to view the status of all networks.

android.permission.CAMERA.description: Allows application to take pictures and videos with the camera. This allows the application to collect images that the camera is seeing at any time.

android.permission.INTERNET.description: Allows an application to create network sockets.

android.permission.RECEIVE_BOOT_COMPLETE.description: Allows an application to start itself as soon as the system has finished booting. This can make it take longer to start the phone and allow the application to slow down the overall phone by always running.

android.permission.RECORD_AUDIO.description: Allows application to access the audio record path.

android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAG.description: Allows an application to write to external storage.

android.permission.WAKE_LOCK.description: Allows an application to prevent the phone from going to sleep.

com.google.android.c2dm.permission.RECEI.description: Permission for cloud to device messaging.

certificate_findings: Application is signed with a code signing certificate
Application is signed with v1 signature scheme, making it vulnerable to Janus vulnerability on Android <7.0
Application is signed with SHA1withRSA. SHA1 hash algorithm is known to have collision issues. The manifest file indicates SHA256withRSA is in use.

manifest_analysis.title:
Application Data can be Backed up
[android:allowBackup=true]
manifest_analysis.desc: This flag allows anyone to backup your application data via adb. It allows users who have enabled USB debugging to copy application data off of the device.
manifest_analysis.name: Application Data can be Backed up [android:allowBackup=true]

manifest_analysis.title:
Activity (com.chimbori.hermitcrab.WebActivity) is not Protected.
An intent-filter exists.
manifest_analysis.desc: An Activity is found to be shared with other apps on the device therefore leaving it accessible to any other application on the device. The presence of intent-filter indicates that the Activity is explicitly exported.
manifest_analysis.name: is not Protected.An intent-filter exists.

manifest_analysis.title: Launch Mode of Activity (com.chimbori.hermitcrab.AdminActivity) is not standard.
manifest_analysis.desc: An Activity should not be having the launch mode attribute set to "singleTask/singleInstance" as it becomes root Activity and it is possible for other applications to read the contents of the calling Intent. So it is required to use the "standard" launch mode attribute when sensitive information is included in an Intent.
manifest_analysis.name: Launch Mode of Activity is not standard.

manifest_analysis.title:
Service (com.chimbori.hermitcrab.ShareChooserService) is Protected by a permission, but the protection level of the permission should be checked.
Permission: android.permission.BIND_CHOOSER_TARGET_SERVICE
[android:exported=true]
manifest_analysis.desc: A Service is found to be shared with other apps on the device therefore leaving it accessible to any other application on the device. It is protected by a permission which is not defined in the analysed application. As a result, the protection level of the permission should be checked where it is defined. If it is set to normal or dangerous, a malicious application can request and obtain the permission and interact with the component. If it is set to signature, only applications signed with the same certificate can obtain the permission.
manifest_analysis.name: is Protected by a permission, but the protection level of the permission should be checked.[android:exported=true]

metadata.description: Query Database of SMS, Contacts etc
The App logs information. Sensitive information should never be logged.
metadata.cwe: CWE-532 Insertion of Sensitive Information into Log File

metadata.description: App uses SQLite Database and execute raw SQL query. Untrusted user input in raw SQL queries can cause SQL Injection. Also sensitive information should be encrypted and written to the database.
metadata.cwe: CWE-89 Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection')

metadata.description: This App copies data to clipboard. Sensitive data should not be copied to clipboard as other applications can access it.
App can read/write to External Storage. Any App can read data written to External Storage.

FCS_RBG_EXT.1.1.choice: The application invoke platform-provided DRBG functionality for its cryptographic operations.

FCS_STO_EXT.1.1.choice: The application does not store any credentials to non-volatile memory.

FCS_CKM_EXT.1.1.choice: The application implement asymmetric key generation.

FDP_DEC_EXT.1.1.choice: The application has access to ['camera', 'network connectivity', 'microphone', 'location'].

FDP_DEC_EXT.1.2.choice: The application has access to no sensitive information repositories.

FDP_NET_EXT.1.1.choice: The application has user/application initiated network communications.

FDP_DAR_EXT.1.1.choice: The application does not encrypt files in non-volatile memory.

FMT_MEC_EXT.1.1.choice: The application invoke the mechanisms recommended by the platform vendor for storing and setting configuration options.

FTP_DIT_EXT.1.1.choice: The application does encrypt some transmitted data with HTTPS/TLS/SSH between itself and another trusted IT product.

FCS_RBG_EXT.2.1,FCS_RBG_EXT.2.2.choice: The application perform all deterministic random bit generation (DRBG) services in accordance with NIST Special Publication 800-90A using Hash_DRBG. The deterministic RBG is seeded by an entropy source that accumulates entropy from a platform-based DRBG and a software-based noise source, with a minimum of 256 bits of entropy at least equal to the greatest security strength (according to NIST SP 800-57) of the keys and hashes that it will generate.

FCS_CKM.1.1(1).choice: The application generate asymmetric cryptographic keys in accordance with a specified cryptographic key generation algorithm RSA schemes using cryptographic key sizes of 2048-bit or greater.

FCS_COP.1.1(3).choice: The application perform cryptographic signature services (generation and verification) in accordance with a specified cryptographic algorithm RSA schemes using cryptographic key sizes of 2048-bit or greater.

FCS_HTTPS_EXT.1.3.choice: The application notify the user and not establish the connection or request application authorization to establish the connection if the peer certificate is deemed invalid.

FIA_X509_EXT.2.1.choice: The application use X.509v3 certificates as defined by RFC 5280 to support authentication for HTTPS , TLS.

FPT_TUD_EXT.2.1.choice: The application shall be distributed using the format of the platform-supported package manager.

strings: "common_google_play_services_update_text" : "%1$s wird nur ausgeführt, wenn du die Google Play-Dienste aktualisierst."
"bookmark_warning_same_as_shortcut" : "Vas a crear un marcador que apunta a la misma ubicación que la propia App Lite. ¿Es esto lo que quieres?"

"intro_start_from_library" : "Para crear una aplicación Lite, pulse en un icono de la aplicación de la Biblioteca libre, o escribir la dirección de un sitio. A continuación, toque el botón “Añadir” (+) para agregarlo a la pantalla principal."
"unable_to_load_url" : "Ninguna aplicación disponible para abrir este enlace"
"intro_uninstall_native" : "Make sure to uninstall your native apps after setting up replacement Hermit Lite Apps!"
"common_google_play_services_api_unavailable_text" : "%1$s requires one or more Google Play services that are not currently available. Please contact the developer for assistance."
"common_google_play_services_install_text_phone" : "Zur Nutzung von %1$s sind Google Play-Dienste erforderlich, die auf deinem Smartphone nicht installiert sind."
"allow_audio_and_video_capture" : "¿Permite “%1$s” para usar su cámara y el micrófono?"
"allow_files_permission" : "Permitir “%1$s” para acceder a sus fotos, vídeos y archivos seleccionados?"
"unable_to_load_url" : "No app available to open this link"
"SSL_DATE_INVALID" : "The date of the certificate is invalid"
"confirm_create_message" : "“%1$s” se añadirá a la pantalla principal."
"common_google_play_services_restricted_profile_text" : "Der Zugriff auf Konten von eingeschränkten Profilen wird nicht unterstützt."
"clear_cookies_dialog_message" : "This will log you out of all Lite Apps."
"common_google_play_services_install_text_phone" : "%1$s won't run without Google Play services, which are missing from your phone."
"send_feedback_question" : "Would you like to send us feedback?"
"common_google_play_services_invalid_account_text" : "Das angegebene Konto ist auf diesem Gerät nicht vorhanden. Bitte wähle ein anderes Konto aus."
"intro_customizations" : "Passen Sie Lite Apps mit unbegrenzten Themen, Werbeblocker , benutzerdefinierte Symbole, Vollbild -Modus, Desktop-Modus und vieles mehr."

"whats_new_long" : "

Optimiert für Android Nougat! (SDK 24) Hermit ist bereit für die nächste Version von Android, bevor Google veröffentlicht es.

Multi-Fenster-Unterstützung: Auf Android-Nougat, Videos anschauen, während Sie Ihre Lieblingsseiten surfen, ohne für die anderen Anwendungen warten Multi-Fenster-Unterstützung zu implementieren.

Null Erforderliche Berechtigungen für die regelmäßige Nutzung: Sie spezielle Berechtigungen für spezielle Aktionen zu ermöglichen, benötigen (z Lage Erlaubnis nur dann, wenn Sie möchten, zu einem Ort, der Check-in)

Lite App spezifischer Berechtigungen: Selektiv deaktivieren Berechtigungen für jede Lite App. Stärkere Erlaubnis Kontrollen als beide Chrome und Android Eibisch.

Fehlerbehebungen und Leistungsverbesserungen. Tippen Sie auf "Weitere Informationen" finden Sie die vollständige Liste."
"glad_youre_enjoying" : "Wir freuen uns, dass Sie zufrieden sind!"
"common_google_play_services_unsupported_text" : "%1$s se basa en Servicios de Google Play, pero no es compatible con tu dispositivo. Ponte en contacto con el fabricante para obtener asistencia."
"common_google_play_services_enable_text" : "%1$s no funcionará hasta que no habilites Servicios de Google Play."
"confirm_create_message" : "“%1$s” will be added to your home screen."
"common_google_play_services_unknown_issue" : "%1$s tiene problemas conServicios de Google Play. Si el problema persiste, ponte en contacto con el desarrollador para obtener ayuda."
"test_feed_before_saving" : "Testen Sie den Feed vor dem Speichern"
"endpoint_search_instructions" : "Utilice “%s” donde debería aparecer la consulta de búsqueda. P.ej. https://google.com/search?q=%s"
"intro_android_apps_battery" : "Many Android apps drain battery even when you’re not using them. With Hermit, you can replace them with Lite Apps instead."

"whats_in_premium_text" : "Hermit is free, forever, including 100% features, for the first 2 Lite Apps. For unlimited Lite Apps, please upgrade to Premium. 

We respect your privacy, so we don’t show any ads, we don’t track your personal information, and we don’t sell your data. 

Your Premium purchase is our only source of support for ongoing development and helps bring you innovative features!"
"common_google_play_services_enable_text" : "%1$s funktioniert erst nach der Aktivierung der Google Play-Dienste."

"integration_help_message" : "Hermit Aplicaciones Lite integrar profundamente en su Android experiencia, incluida la investigación, el intercambio, la creación de nuevos contenidos y las notificaciones."
"invalid_feed" : "No feed was found at this address"
"common_google_play_services_updating_text" : "%1$s no se ejecutará hasta que finalice la actualización en curso de Servicios de Google Play."
"intro_customizations" : "Personalizar aplicaciones sencillas con temas ilimitado, el bloqueo de anuncios, iconos personalizados, el modo de pantalla completa, modo de escritorio, y mucho más."
"error_missing_intent_extra" : "Hermit’s WebActivity must be started with an Intent that contains a string extra named “url”."
"search_integration_description" : "Add a search URL to search from within Hermit."
"install_sqlite_debugger" : "Installieren Sie SQLite-Debugger zum Anzeigen der Datenbank"

"kitkat_warning_description" : "You may see warnings on some sites asking you to upgrade Chrome. Some sites may cause Hermit to crash. Photo and video uploading will not work on Android KitKat. 

This is because Android KitKat and the pre-installed browser component are 2+ years old and cannot handle modern web sites. 

The issues are not caused by Hermit, and can only be fixed by upgrading to a newer version of Android."

"common_google_play_services_unsupported_text" : "Zur Nutzung von %1$s sind Google Play-Dienste erforderlich. Diese werden auf deinem Gerät jedoch nicht unterstützt. Wende dich für weitere Informationen an den Hersteller."
"search_or_type_url" : "Suchen Sie oder geben Sie die URL ein"
"share_integration_description" : "Share to Lite App from other Android apps"
"endpoint_share_instructions" : "Utilice marcadores de posición que debe aparecer el texto compartido: “%s”: texto completo, “%u”: URL única, “%t”: título solamente."
"integration_help_message" : "Hermit Lite Apps integrate deeply into your Android experience, including search, sharing, creating new content, and notifications."
"error_no_app_to_pick_images" : "No se han encontrado para recoger un icono de aplicación; intente instalar Google Photos"
"common_google_play_services_invalid_account_text" : "The specified account does not exist on this device. Please choose a different account."
"error_purchasing_premium" : "Problem Abschluss Kauf; bitte kontaktieren Sie uns. %1$s"
"no_share_targets_found_message" : "To customize, go to your Lite App → Drawer → Customize → Integrations → Share."
"common_google_play_services_restricted_profile_text" : "No se admite el acceso a las cuentas desde un perfil restringido."
"uninstall_shortcut_warning_title" : "Iconos antiguos se deben eliminar manualmente primera"
"allow_files_permission" : "Allow “%1$s” to access the photos, videos, and files you select?"
"duplicate_shortcut_message_text" : "Es wurde bereits eine Lite App für “%1$s” erstellt."
"error_feeds_broken" : "Algunos alimentos de notificación ya no están disponibles; contactos %1$s en busca de ayuda."
"cleared_cache" : "Limpia cache para todas las aplicaciones Lite"

"intro_what_is_hermit" : "Mit Hermit, können Sie Lite Apps erstellen die nicht im Hintergrund laufen und Akku verbrauchen. Lite Apps nehmen fast keinen Platz, laufen nicht im Hintergrund, sparen Batterie, und Sie können mit Viren oder Malware zu infizieren."
"intro_uninstall_native" : "Asegúrese de desinstalar sus aplicaciones nativas después de la creación de reemplazo Hermit Lite aplicaciones!"
"intro_customizations" : "Customize Lite Apps with unlimited themes, ad blocking, custom icons, full-screen mode, desktop mode, and more."
"common_google_play_services_unknown_issue" : "%1$s hat Probleme mit Google Play-Diensten. Wenn das Problem weiterhin besteht, kontaktiere bitte den Entwickler."
"endpoint_share_instructions" : "Verwenden Sie Platzhalter, wo der gemeinsame Text angezeigt werden soll: “%s”: Volltext , “%u”: URL nur, “%t”: nur Titel."
"common_google_play_services_updating_text" : "Zur Nutzung von %1$s sind Google Play-Dienste erforderlich, die gerade aktualisiert werden."
"common_google_play_services_network_error_text" : "Um eine Verbindung zu den Google Play-Diensten herzustellen, ist eine Datenverbindung erforderlich."
"error_purchasing_premium" : "Problema para completar la compra; por favor contáctenos. %1$s"
"endpoint_search_instructions" : "Mit “%s”, wo die Suchabfrage angezeigt werden soll. Z.B. https://google.com/search?q=%s"
"bookmarks_zero_state" : "Bookmark your frequently visited pages. Keep your favorite stuff on top."

"whats_new_long" : "

Optimizado para Android Nougat! (SDK 24) Hermit está listo para la próxima versión de Android antes de que Google lo suelte.

El soporte multi-ventana: En Android turrón, ver vídeos mientras navega por sus sitios favoritos, sin esperar a que esas otras aplicaciones para implementar soporte multi-ventana.

Cero Permisos necesarios para el uso regular: sólo es necesario para permitir que los permisos especiales para acciones especiales (por ejemplo, el permiso de ubicación sólo cuando se desea hacer el ingreso a un lugar)

Lite App permisos específicos: deshabilitar selectivamente permisos para cualquier aplicación Lite. controles de permisos más fuerte que tanto Chrome y Android malvavisco.

Corrección de errores y mejoras de rendimiento. Pulse en "Más información" para obtener la lista completa."
"whats_new_short" : "Android Nougat multi-ventana, Permisos de cero, y mucho más!"

"kitkat_warning_description" : "Usted puede ver las advertencias en algunos sitios que te pide actualizar Chrome. Algunos sitios pueden causar Hermit a crash. Foto y subir video no funcionará en Android KitKat. 

 Esto es porque Android el componente navegador preinstalado y KitKat 2 + años de edad y no puede manejar sitios web modernos. 

 Los problemas no son causados por Hermit y sólo puede ser fijado mediante la actualización a Android Lollipop o Marshmallow."
"integration_help_message" : "Hermit Lite Apps integrieren tief in die Android Erfahrung, einschließlich der Suche, den Austausch, die Schaffung neuer Inhalte und Benachrichtigungen."
"play_store_link_failed" : "Google Play Store konnte nicht gestartet werden, ist er installiert?"
"intro_start_from_library" : "To create a Lite App, tap on an app icon from the free Library, or type in the address of a site. Then tap the “Add” (+) button to add it to your home screen."
"uninstall_shortcut_warning_title" : "Old icons must be manually deleted first"
"common_google_play_services_sign_in_failed_text" : "Error signing in the specified account. Please choose a different account."
"clear_cookies_dialog_message" : "Dadurch werden Sie bei allen Lite Apps abgemeldet."

"rating_request" : "We’ve worked hard to make Hermit a 5-star experience for you!

Would you like to rate this app?"

"kitkat_warning_description" : "Es werden möglicherweise Warnungen angezeigt, wenn eine Website Sie auffordert Chrome zu aktualisieren. Einige Websites können Hermit zum Absturz zu bringen.
    Foto und Video hochladen funktioniert nicht auf Android KitKat.


 Dies kommt von der installierten Android KitKat Version und dem vorinstallierten Browser wenn sie älter als 2 + Jahre und nicht mit modernen Web-Sites kompatibel sind.


 Die Probleme entstehen nicht durch Hermit, und kann nur durch ein Upgrade auf Android Lollipop oder Marshmallow behoben werden.
"
"vibrate_pattern" : "Vibrate pattern — dots & dashes, like Morse code"
"endpoint_search_instructions" : "Use “%s” where the search query should appear. E.g. https://google.com/search?q=%s"

"whats_in_premium_text" : "Hermit es gratis, para siempre, incluyendo 100% características, para la primera 2 Lite Aplicaciones. Para un número ilimitado Aplicaciones Lite, por favor, actualice a Premium.      

Respetamos su privacidad, por lo que no muestran ningún anuncio, no rastreamos su información personal, y nosotros no vendemos su datos.      

Su compra Premium es nuestra única fuente de apoyo para el desarrollo continuo y ayuda a traer características innovadoras!"
"bookmarks_zero_state" : "Bookmarken Sie Ihre häufig besuchten Seiten. Halten Sie Ihre Lieblings-Bestellung an der Spitze."
"no_share_targets_found_message" : "Anzupassen, gehen Sie zu Ihrem Lite App → Schublade → Anpassen → Integrations → Teilen."
"allow_audio_and_video_capture" : "Allow “%1$s” to use your camera and microphone?"
"bookmark_warning_same_as_shortcut" : "Sie sind dabei ein Lesezeichen auf die gleiche URL zu erstellen wie die Lite App selbst. Ist es das was Sie wollen?"
"notifications_integration_description" : "Añadir un feed URL para obtener notificaciones sobre tus aplicaciones Lite. Toque un feed para configurar sonidos, iconos y patrones de vibración."

"uninstall_shortcut_warning_description" : "Some Android versions don’t allow apps to automatically remove icons from the home screen. 

To remove old icons manually, tap and hold an icon, then drag it off the screen (or follow the instructions for your phone or launcher)."

"intro_start_from_library" : "Eine Lite App, tippen Sie auf ein App-Symbol aus der freien Bibliothek, oder geben Sie die Adresse einer Website zu erstellen. Tippen Sie dann auf die Schaltfläche "Hinzufügen" (+), um es zu Ihrem Home-Bildschirm hinzufügen."

"whats_new_long" : "

Optimized for Android Nougat! (SDK 24) Hermit is ready for the next version of Android before Google releases it.

Multi-Window support: On Android Nougat, watch videos while browsing your favorite sites, without waiting for those other apps to implement multi-window support.

Zero Permissions Required for regular usage: you only need to allow special permissions for special actions (e.g. location permission only when you want to check-in to a place)

Lite App Specific Permissions: Selectively disable permissions for any Lite App. Stronger permission controls than both Chrome and Android Marshmallow.

Bug Fixes & Performance Improvements. Tap “Learn More” below for the full list."

playstore_details.title: Hermit • Lite Apps Browser
playstore_details.description:
WHAT ARE LITE APPS?
Fast, Tiny Web Apps with awesome Android integration

With Hermit, you can replace your large native apps with Web-based Lite Apps.

Browse faster, save data, block ads, protect your privacy, browse in Night Mode, Reader View, and customize your Lite Apps with over 20 different settings for every Lite App! All in a 3 MB app.

UNLIMITED LITE APPS, FREE FOREVER
Free Forever: No limits, no ads, no tracking, no payment!
Premium: Get access to current and future Premium features with a ONE-TIME purchase:
Read More: https://hermit.chimbori.com/features/premium

EARLY ACCESS PROGRAM
Subscribe to use all the newest features before everyone else!
Read More Why: https://hermit.chimbori.com/early-access

We respect your privacy, so we don’t collect any personal information or sell your data. You are our only source of support for many more years of innovative feature-packed updates. Thank you!

BROWSE FASTER. SAVE DATA.
Hermit speeds up your browsing while also protecting your privacy.
No Ads. Not even in the Free Version.
Ad Blocker: Makes all web pages lean, tiny, and beautiful again.
Popup Blocker: Prevents unsafe and deceptive sites from opening new tabs or vibrating your phone.
JavaScript Blocker: makes most pages load faster.
Data Saver Mode: Speeds up browsing by reducing image size.

PROTECT YOUR PRIVACY.
Privacy Focused: No ads, no behavior tracking, no personal information collected.
Phishing and Malware Protection: Hermit blocks any attempts to install native Android apps & integrates Google’s Malware Blocker.
Incognito Keyboard: Any site URLs you type will be marked private by your keyboard, and not used to personalize auto-completion.

SUPERIOR BROWSING FEATURES
Scriptlets: Run your own custom extension scripts! In-built support for Google Translate, Lite Pages, QR Code, and many others.
Reader App: Read Articles from any browser/app using Hermit’s article extraction technology.
Night Mode: View any web site in Night Mode with a dark background and light text.
Estimated Reading Time: See how long an article will take to read, and jump to Reader View.
Multi Window: Use two Lite Apps at once on Android Nougat and above.
Text Size: Increase/decrease text size to improve legibility.
Double Back: Ever got stuck because the back button takes you to the same page? Try Hermit’s Double Back feature!

ANDROID SYSTEM INTEGRATION
Direct Share: Share text & links from any Android app to Hermit Lite Apps.
Add Home Screen Icons: Other browsers merely add an icon and forget your settings. Hermit makes it into a true Lite App. Compare for yourself: https://hermit.chimbori.com/features/compare
Tab Reuse: Hermit doesn’t open new tabs if your Lite App is already open, just like native apps.
Atom/RSS Feed Notifications: Get immediately notified when a web site publishes new content.
Web Monitors: Feeds not supported? Hermit can monitor any specific part of any web page and notify you when it changes.

UNLIMITED CUSTOMIZATION
No other browser lets you customize as many settings as Hermit, and they’re saved individually for each Lite App.
Custom Icons: Pick any icon for your Lite Apps, or create a custom monogram!
Color Picker: Create your own theme.
Text Size: Change and save settings individually for each site.
Desktop Mode: Load desktop sites instead of mobile sites.
Frameless Mode & Full Screen Mode: You’ll have to try these out for yourself!
Orientation: Choose whether you want a Lite App to always open Vertical or Horizontal.
playstore_details.summary: Native apps eating up battery and slowing down your phone? Switch to Lite Apps.
playstore_details.summaryHTML: Native apps eating up battery and slowing down your phone? Switch to Lite Apps.
playstore_details.developerAddress: Made with love in Redwood Shores, California
playstore_details.recentChanges:
- Reorganized Settings for each Lite App & Main App. Clearer, easy to navigate, better looking

- Got Premium for cheap many years ago? Happy with 5+ years of updates? Got Play Store credit & want to show your support? Tips accepted with gratitude! 🙏 (in Settings)

- Always set a custom user agent for all requests: some feeds require it
- Set Dark Mode correctly
- Correctly open newly-created Lite Apps from URLs
playstore_details.recentChangesHTML:
- Reorganized Settings for each Lite App & Main App. Clearer, easy to navigate, better looking

- Got Premium for cheap many years ago? Happy with 5+ years of updates? Got Play Store credit & want to show your support? Tips accepted with gratitude! 🙏 (in Settings)

- Always set a custom user agent for all requests: some feeds require it
- Set Dark Mode correctly
- Correctly open newly-created Lite Apps from URLs
